title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still can't access.

title: Payment Failure - Card Declined
description: Customer's payment is being declined despite valid card details. Issue persists with multiple cards.

title: Page Not Loading - Dashboard
description: User reports that the dashboard page remains blank after login. Tested on multiple browsers.

title: Email Notifications Not Received
description: Customer is not receiving order confirmation or password reset emails.

title: App Crashing on Launch
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after opening on Android devices.

title: Password Reset Link Expired
description: Password reset emails sent to the user have expired before they can be used.

title: Double Charges on Subscription
description: Customer has been charged twice for the same monthly subscription.

title: Search Function Not Working
description: Search results return empty even when items are available in the system.

title: Profile Picture Upload Error
description: Customer unable to upload profile picture due to a server error.

title: Slow Website Performance
description: Pages are taking more than 10 seconds to load, affecting usability.

title: Order History Not Displaying
description: Customer cannot see past orders in their account dashboard.

title: Refund Request Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund 10 days ago but it hasnâ€™t been processed yet.

title: Incorrect Billing Amount
description: The billing invoice shows a higher amount than what was originally agreed upon.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Not Working
description: User is unable to log in as the 2FA code is not being accepted.

title: Broken Link on Help Center
description: One of the FAQ links on the help center page leads to a 404 error.
